long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SeekSync lets you and your friends watch videos together, no matter where you are. Pause, play, and seek videos in perfect sync with everyone in your group. Enjoy seamless chat while you watch. Perfect for virtual movie nights, study sessions, or just hanging out.

NOTE: This is an open source extension and requires a companion server to function. For more details on how to use and set it up, visit https://github.com/nikhilweee/seeksync
